name: Casiss Midagatis
content:
Casiss Midagatis was a male Felucian who was the elder of a nysillin farming village on Felucia. During the Clone Wars, his village was threatened by the Ohnaka Gang who wanted a portion of the nysillin. Midagatis hired four bounty hunters—Sugi, Embo, Rumi Paramita, and Seripas—to fight the pirates, and later, the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano also agreed to help after their ship crash-landed nearby. After helping the villagers learn how to fight and defeat the Ohnaka Gang, Midagatis thanked the Jedi and bounty hunters before setting off to oversee the rebuilding of the village.
Gregory Baldwin voiced Midagatis in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Bounty Hunters."
